location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 1/6A Officers of Other Departments: Postings and Transfers'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Circled serial numbers (red for received correspondence; blue/black for issued correspondence) refer to entries in the notes at the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation system in use begins at 1 on the front cover and continues through to 29 on the last folio before the back cover. The sequence appears written in pencil, enclosed in a circle, in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio. A second sequence commences at 1 on f. 2 and continues through to 24 on f. 26 This sequence is written in both pencil and ink.

mods.abstract: The file consists of transcripts of telegrams and some letters either sent direct to the Political Agent, Bahrain, or forwarded by the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, announcing the appointment and transfer of British officials of the Government of India, some Government bodies and other agencies in the Persian Gulf region. The file also contains a press communique announcing the composition of the Interim Government of India, October 1946, and telegrams announcing appointments and organisational changes within the Interim Government.
